name: Teodor
description:
This game was made for Juice Jam ||

Jam Page Here!

Description

Your goal is to defeat as many monsters as you can while surviving and learning new skills.

On battle stages, enter rune combinations using Q, W, E, I, O, P buttons to use skills. Each skill has a cooldown displayed under your health bar, during which you can't cast any spells. Skills can damage your opponent, protect or heal you. Press Enter to use the typed runes combination or Space to reset runes.

You can press Tab anytime to see your skills.

Try to predict, what your opponent will do next and counterplay him.

On the bonfire, you can learn a new skill from suggestions.

As you progress through each stage, your opponents become stronger, but you will not regenerate your health.

Controls

 - Cast Runes

 - Reset Runes

  - Apply Runes

 - View skills

Created by:

  • Dan Tselish
  • Andrii Oliinyk
  • Vlad Borodai
  • Davyd Pidruchniak
  • Karina Kotulych

Created with Unity engine
